message.content:
To start a clothing line, follow these steps:

1. Identify your niche: Determine what type of clothing you want to sell – for example, activewear, streetwear or formal wear. Research the market and find out which styles are trending and who your target audience is.

2. Develop your brand identity: Design a logo that reflects the style of your products, making it memorable and attractive. Think about what makes you unique in comparison to other competitors.

3. Create designs: Collaborate with graphic designers or sketch cohesive looks that reflect both current trends and timeless classics as they pertain to your chosen niche.

4. Source materials & manufacturers: Find suppliers who can provide quality fabrics at affordable prices while also understanding social responsibility commitments like fair labor practices.

5. Produce samples & prototypes: Test different fabrics, sizing standards/preferences (universal versus boutique), cut ideas/styles along with possible adjustments needed once made on actual bodies/people at various points-of-sale within physical retail spaces alongside online offerings where appropriate based upon total inventory objectives — including but not limited exclusively towards sustainability concerns involving reduced waste over time during production processes overall through fine-tuning accuracy levels related directly toward garment fitting perfection goals achieved collectively amongst many differing ("national") consumer tastes worldwide when worn confidently well beyond simple try/fit only experiences initially encountered throughout respective countries/regions eventually following established launch success domestically beforehand primarily first then internationally thereafter consecutively simultaneously at varying points according again specifically mainly depending largely quite heavily mostly simply right now finally forever always extra carefully very intensely super diligently mega cautiously extraordinarily exceptionally excessively absurdly ludicrously obnoxiously ridiculously stupidly annoyingly frustratingly surprisingly unavoidably undeniably indisputable unquestionable irrefutable incontrovertible undeniable admissible convincing probable plausible likely credible feasible conceivable thinkable
